Package game.adventuregame.model

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.adventuregame.model.Item
  • public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    Models Items with given name and description for the game.

    An Item has its name,description,location and portable status.

    Author:
    Shankar Ammai
    See Also:
    Location

    • Constructor Detail

      • Item

        public Item​(java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String description)
        Creates an Item with given name and description

        Creates an Item with given name and description then sets its location to null and portable status to false.

        Parameters:
        name - Name of the item
        description - Description of the item

    • Method Detail

        Parameters:

      • isPortable

        public boolean isPortable()
        Returns If the item is portable or not.

        If the value is true then the item is portable. Otherwise Item is not portable.

        Returns:
        if the Item is portable or not.

      • setPortable

        public void setPortable​(boolean portable)
        Sets the portable status of the item.

        If true is provided as the parameter then the item is portable. If the parameter is false then item is not portable.

        Parameters:
        portable - Portable status of the item.
